divs: sighting detailsi was in my car, driving north on farm to market road in brewster at about 30 mph. it was almost 7pm and dark out. through the trees ahead of me on the left i saw some red and white lights. at first i thought it was a plane, but as i got closer i realized the lights were in the same place; i was actually getting closer to them, and they were quite low, just over the trees. i then thought it was a tower of some sort, although i know there is no tower in that area...it is all residential and quite wooded. i came upon a place where the trees thinned and i could see the lights more clearly. there was no traffic, so i stopped my car in the middle of the road and just stared at it. i remember getting a very strong nervous feeling in my stomach, i almost felt queasy, thinking to myself "what the heck am i looking at??" after doing some calculations later when i got home, i'm estimating that it was about 300 feet away from me, just above the trees. it was not moving at all. it had flashing lights, white and red, and a bit of blue; my recollection is there was only one blue light and the rest were white and red. all were blinking, but were not placed in any particular configuration. i was unable to determine the shape of the object; it was quite dark and the lights provided no illumination, but the impression i got was that it was round, but more like a short cylinder. i would estimate that it was about 5 times bigger than a car. there was no noise. i watched it for about 30 seconds before i suddenly thought to take a photo with my phone but before i could get it, i saw the object start moving very slowly to the west--away from me. that freaked me out, because i think maybe in the back of my mind i was still believing it to be some sort of tower. the lights remained in the same position, meaning that the object didn't spin around as far as i could tell. then a car came up behind me and i had to start moving. i continued to look to my left and could still see the object intermittently through the trees, moving away from me. at the end of farm to market, i turned left onto route 164, then right onto cornwall hill road and drove to the top of the hill and pulled into the subdivision there, facing west. i could still see the lights, but by now they were quite small and it looked like an airplane from this distance. it appeared to still be moving quite slowly, and quite low...way too low for an airplane. it disappeared over a distant hill. the route it was moving would have taken it directly over the interstate in carmel, so i checked to see if there had been any ufo reports, but i didn't see any. this happened on 10\21\09 between approx. 6:50 and 7:00 pm.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Brewster
There were no other sightings in Brewster on or around October 21st 2009
Summary: Stationary blinking lights over the trees, then started slowly moving
